createAppDialog.title: Docker Compose Required
createAppDialog.description: To create an app for deployment, this repository needs a Docker Compose file.
createAppDialog.instructions: Create one of the following files in your repository:

delete.title: Delete Repository
delete.description: This will remove "{{name}}" from Vibora. The actual repository files will not be affected.
delete.alsoDeleteDirectory: Also delete the directory from disk
delete.deleteDirectoryWarning: This will permanently delete all files in the repository. This action cannot be undone.

addModal.title: Add Repository
addModal.description: Add a git repository from a URL or local path, or scan a directory.

fields.startupScriptDescription: Command to run in the terminal when creating a worktree.
fields.copyFilesDescription: Comma-separated glob patterns for files to copy into new worktrees.
fields.isCopierTemplateDescription: Mark as a template for creating new projects.

template.description: Select a template to create your project from.
template.help: Copier generates new projects from templates, letting you scaffold applications with pre-configured settings.
template.customUrlHelp: Git URL or local path to a Copier template.

questions.noQuestions: This template has no configuration questions.

output.description: Choose where to create your project.
output.trustWarning: This template runs code during project creation. Only enable if you trust the source.

bulkAdd.title: Scan Directory for Repositories
bulkAdd.description: Find and add multiple git repositories from a directory.
bulkAdd.noReposFound: No git repositories found in this directory.

empty.noRepositories: No repositories added yet. Add a repository for quick access when creating tasks.

settings.startupScriptDescription: Command to run in the terminal when creating a worktree.
settings.claudeOptionsDescription: CLI flags passed to Claude when starting a task.
settings.copyFilesDescription: Comma-separated glob patterns for files to copy into new worktrees.
settings.isCopierTemplateDescription: Mark as a template for creating new projects with Copier.
